main.name: Dinu Wijetunga
main.languages: Kotlin | Python | Java | MySQL | ReactJS | AWS | Docker
main.bio: My name’s Dinu (think Dinu the Dinosaur to help you remember!), and I'm a 1A Software Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. I’m passionate about using my technical skills and leadership abilities to develop technology that improves lives around the world. In my free time, I enjoy exploring the outdoors, hanging out with friends, cooking and baking, and going swimming as often as I can! Check out the rest of my website to learn more about me.
